G

game - Variable in class main.GamePanel
This is the game where all of the mouseInputs should be directed to
game - Variable in class states.State
The game that the state's will be held/handled in protected = private for children
game - Variable in class ui.PauseOverlay
The main game class that has is using the audio players
Game - Class in main
This class handle most logic pertaining to the game, including updates, FPS, level scale, and tile amount on screen.
Game() - Constructor for class main.Game
The constructor for this class, once this is called then the game will start running.
GAME_HEIGHT - Static variable in class main.Game
The amount of pixels tall that the game is (already scaled)
GAME_WIDTH - Static variable in class main.Game
The amount of pixels wide that the game is (already scaled)
